title: Stock market news live updates: Nasdaq futures plunge following Facebook earnings miss - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Nasdaq futures plunge following Facebook earnings miss  Yahoo Finance
description: The winning streak in equities was eclipsed by disappointing fourth quarter results from Facebook parent company Meta, which reported figures after the bell on Wednesday. Contracts on the tech-focused Nasdaq Composite dropped 1.68 heading into overnight trading following the results.
